content.description: The next questions refer to the 1950 poster, shown below, created by the French Communist Party.
content.question: The creators of the poster also likely opposed which of the following?

choices.label: Greater involvement of women in politics and education
The expansion of social welfare programs
The continued French government of Algeria
The expansion of Soviet economic influence in Eastern Europe

content.answer: The continued French government of Algeria

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
